onPressed.description: The listener to be called when the actionable is pressed.

onDoublePressed.description: The listener to be called when the actionable is double pressed.

onLongPressed.description: The listener to be called when the actionable is long pressed.

onPressedCancel.description: The listener to be called when the actionable is pressed inside and released outside of the actionable, causing it to cancel the press action.

onHovered.description: The listener to be called when the actionable is hovered and when the mouse exits the hoverable area.

submit.description: Whether the actionable can submit a form.

text.description: The value of the text inside the button

disabled.description: The button is disabled if true

submit.description: Whether the button is a submit button for a form.

value.description: The default state of the checkbox

tristate.description: Whether the checkbox can have 3 states.

autofocus.description: Whether the checkbox is focused initially.

name.description: The name that will be used in the form.

text.description: The text of the dropdown button

disabled.description: If true, the dropdown button is disabled

mainAxisAlignment.description: The alignment along the main axis

crossAxisAlignment.description: The alignment along the cross axis

spacing.description: The multiplier of the base size for the minimal spacing

fillParent.description: if true the flex will fill the main axis. Otherwise it will take the children size.

scroll.description: If true the flex will scroll if there is too many item in the Main Axis.

flex.description: How a flexible child is inscribed into the available space.

onSubmit.description: Callback when the user submits the form.

color.description: The color of the Icon. If not set or null, the color is inherited from the theme.

semanticLabel.description: The semantic label for the Icon. This will be announced when using accessibility mode.

src.description: The URL to the image. Will fetch the application's image if the URL does not start with `http(s)://`.

centerSlice.description: The center slice for a nine-patch image.

errorPlaceholder.description: The error placeholder when the image encounters an error during loading.

excludeFromSemantics.description: Whether to exclude this image from semantics.

fit.description: How the image should fit the parent box.

framePlaceholder.description: A placeholder to display while the image is loading or to add effects to the image.

gaplessPlayback.description: Whether the old image (true) or nothing (false) is shown when the image provider changes.

isAntiAlias.description: Whether to paint the image with anti-aliasing.

loadingPlaceholder.description: A placeholder to display while the image is still loading.

repeat.description: How the image should be repeated accross the bounds not covered by the image.

semanticLabel.description: A semantic description of the image. This is used for TalkBack on Android and VoiceOver on IOS.

isSelected.description: Whether the element is selected or not.

disabled.description: Whether the element should be disabled or not.

maintainState.description: Whether this entry must be included in the tree even if there is a fully opaque entry above it.

opaque.description: Whether this entry occludes the entire overlay.

showOverlay.description: Whether this entry should be shown.

autofocus.description: Whether the radio will be selected initially.

groupValue.description: The value group of the radio

materialTapTargetSize.description: Configures the minimum size of the tap target.

toggleable.description: Whether the radio is allowed to go from checked to unchecked when clicking on it.

name.description: The name that will be used in the form.

autofocus.description: Whether the slider should be focused initially.

divisions.description: The number of divisions to show on the slider.

min.description: The minimum value of the slider.

max.description: The maximum value of the slider.

onChanged.description: The callback to be invoked when the slider value changes.

onChangeEnd.description: The callback to be invoked when the slider is released.

onChangeStart.description: The callback to be invoked when the slider is pressed.

value.description: The current value of the slider.

name.description: The name that will be used in the form.

value.description: the value displayed in the element

semanticsLabel.description: The value to explain a different semantics

spellOut.description: Whether the assistive technologies should spell out this text character by character

children.description: Additional texts to add after this text.

value.description: The value displayed inside the Textfield

autofillHints.description: The type of this text input to provide autofill hints.

autofocus.description: Whether this Textfield should be focused initially.

buildCounter.description: Callback that generates a custom counter view.

dragStartBehavior.description: Determines the way that drag start behavior is handled.

enabled.description: Whether the text field is enabled.

enableInteractiveSelection.description: Whether to enable user interface options to change the text selection.

expands.description: Whether the TextField is sized to fill its parent.

keyboardType.description: The type of the keyboard to use for editing the text.

maxLength.description: The maximum number of characters to allow in the text field.

maxLengthEnforcement.description: Determines how the maxLength limit should be enforced.

maxLines.description: The maximum number of lines to show at one time.

minLines.description: The minimum number of lines to occupy on the screen.

obscureText.description: Whether to hide the text being edited.

onAppPrivateCommand.description: This is used to receive a private command from the input method.

onChanged.description: Callback when the user changes the text field value.

onEditingComplete.description: Callback when the user finishes editing the text field.

onSubmitted.description: Callback when the user tells he is done editing the text field.

onTap.description: Callback when the user taps on the text field.

readOnly.description: Whether the text can be changed.

textCapitalization.description: Configures how the platform keyboard will select an uppercase or lowercase keyboard.

textInputAction.description: The type of the action button to use for the keyboard.

name.description: The name that will be used in the form.

splashRadius.description: The splash radius when you click on the toggle.

dragStartBehavior.description: Determines the way that drag start behavior is handled.

name.description: The name that will be used in the form.

disabled.description: The toggle is disabled if true

query.description: The query to apply to the data.

coll.description: the collection where the query is applied

context.description: The context projection. This field represents the projection of the context, allowing selective retrieval of specific elements. It is a map that specifies the desired elements to be included in the projection.

spacing.description: The spacing between each child of the wrap.

runSpacing.description: The spacing between each run of the wrap.

wrapCrossAlignment.title: Wrap CrossAlignment
wrapCrossAlignment.description: How the objects in the Wrap should be aligned on the CrossAxis.

wrapAlignment.title: Wrap Alignment
wrapAlignment.description: How the objects in the Wrap should be aligned.

textDirection.title: Text Direction
textDirection.description: In which direction the elements should be placed following the horizontal axis.

verticalDirection.title: Vertical Direction
verticalDirection.description: How the objects should be aligned following the vertical axis.

query.description: The query to apply to the data.

coll.description: the collection where the query is applied

autofillHints.title: AutofillHints
autofillHints.description: The AutofillHints enum to handle textfield's autocompletion.

obscuringCharacter.description: The character used to obscure the text.

scrollPadding.description: The padding of the scrollable when the Textfield scrolls into view.

selectionHeightStyle.description: The height of the selection highlight boxes.

selectionWidthStyle.description: The width of the selection highlight boxes.

textAlignVertical.description: How the text should be aligned vertically.

copy.description: Whether to show copy option in toolbar

cut.description: Whether to show cut option in toolbar

paste.description: Whether to show past option in toolbar

selectAll.description: Whether to show select all option in toolbar

decimal.description: The number is decimal, allowing a decimal point to provide fractional

signed.description: The number is signed, allowing a positive or negative sign at the start.

alignLabelWithHint.description: Whether to align the label with the hint or not. Defaults to false.

border.description: The border to display around the input. Will render a border by default when border is null.

constraints.description: The constraints to be applied to the input.

contentPadding.description: The padding to be applied to the input.

counterStyle.description: The style use for the counterText.

counterText.description: The text to place below the line as a character counter.

disabledBorder.description: The border to display when the input is disabled and not showing an error.

enabled.description: Whether the input is enabled or disabled.

enabledBorder.description: The border to display when the input is enabled and not showing an error.

errorBorder.description: The border to display when the input has an error and does not have the focus.

errorMaxLines.description: The maximum number of lines the error text can use.

errorStyle.description: The style to use for the error text.

errorText.description: The error text to display when the input has an error.

fillColor.description: The fill color of the input.

filled.description: Whether the input is filled with fillColor.

floatingLabelBehavior.description: Defines how the floating label should be displayed.

floatingLabelStyle.description: The style to use for the floating label.

focusColor.description: The color to use when the input is focused.

focusedBorder.description: The border to display when the input has the focus.

focusedErrorBorder.description: The border to display when the input has the focus and has an error.

helperMaxLines.description: The maximum number of lines the helper text can use.

helperStyle.description: The style to use for the helper text.

hintMaxLines.description: The maximum number of lines the hint text can use.

hintStyle.description: The style to use for the hint text.

hintTextDirection.description: The direction of the hint text.

hoverColor.description: The color to use when the input is hovered.

isCollapsed.description: Whether the decoration is the same size as the input field.

labelStyle.description: The style to use for the label.

labelText.description: The text that describes the input field.

prefixStyle.description: The style to use for the prefixText.

prefixText.description: The text to display before the input.

semanticCounterText.description: The semantic label for the counterText.

suffixStyle.description: The style to use for the suffixText.

suffixText.description: The text to display after the input.

strutStyle.title: StrutStyle
strutStyle.description: Defines the strut of a text line.

debugLabel.description: A label to help identify this strut style.

fontFamily.description: The font family to use for this strut style.

fontFamilyFallback.description: A list of fallback font families to use for this strut style.

fontSize.description: The font size to use for this strut style.

fontWeight.description: The font weight to use for this strut style.

forceStrutHeight.description: Whether to force the strut height.

height.description: The minimum height of the strut.

leading.description: The additional leading of the strut which is a multiple of fontSize.

fontFamily.description: The font family of the text.

fontFamilyFallback.description: The list of font families to use if the first font family could not be found.

letterSpacing.description: The amount of space to add between each letter.

overflow.description: How visual text overflow should be handled.

shadows.description: A list of Shadows that will be painted underneath the text.

textBaseline.description: The common baseline that should be aligned between this text and its parent text.

wordSpacing.description: The amount of space to add at each sequence of white-space.

textDecoration.title: Text Decoration
textDecoration.description: Allows you to underline, overline or strike out the text.

textDecorationStyle.title: Text Decoration Style
textDecorationStyle.description: The style in which to draw a text decoration.

textBaseline.title: TextBaseline
textBaseline.description: A horizontal line used for aligning text.

dx.description: The Offset along the x axis

dy.description: The Offset along the y axis

maxWidth.description: The maxWidth of the constraint, -1 means Infinity

maxHeight.description: The maxHeight of the constraint, -1 means Infinity

countryCode.description: The region subtag for the locale.

languageCode.description: The primary language subtag for the locale.

scriptCode.description: The script subtag for the locale.

activeColor.description: Color of the active radio button

focusColor.description: Color of the radio when it is focused

hovercolor.description: Color when the mouse is over the element

unselectedColor.description: Color when the radio is not selected

splashRadius.description: The splash radius of the radio button

visualDensity.title: VisualDensity
visualDensity.description: The visual density of UI components.

left.description: The left position of the rectangle.

top.description: The top position of the rectangle.

boxFit.title: Box Fit
boxFit.description: How the box should be fitted in its parent.

imageRepeat.title: Image Repeat
imageRepeat.description: How the image should be painted on the areas that it does not cover.

iconName.title: IconName
iconName.description: All of the possible values for an Icon.

flexFit.title: FlexFit
flexFit.description: How a flexible child is inscribed into the available space.

size.title: Size
size.description: The size to use, the component will be sized according to the value.

style.title: Style
style.description: The style to use, the component will be changed according to the theme.

boxShape.title: BoxShape
boxShape.description: The BoxShape enum, used to define the shape of a box.
